abstract: Defense Dept confirms death of one American service member in fight against Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 12 American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State.

headline.main: U.S. Military Deaths in Operations Against ISIS
